casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY DOCKET

90-1705 and 92-1324. Columbus Bar Assn. v. Nichols.

On final certified report of board recommending probation be revoked. Suspension reinstated and respondent found in contempt. Report accepted. The probation of LeRoy Alvin Nichols, Attorney Registration No. 0015743, is revoked, his suspension is reinstated, and he is found in contempt.

Wright, J., not participating.
